title: How Do I Change My Hotmail Password? A Step-by-Step Guide

steps.title: Go to http://account.live.com/password/change in a desktop or mobile browser.
steps.content: Go to http://account.live.com/password/change in a desktop or mobile browser. You can use Google Chrome , Safari, Mozilla Firefox , or another browser. [1] X Trustworthy Source Microsoft Support Technical support and product information from Microsoft. Go to source If you can't remember your current password, you'll need to reset your password instead.

steps.title: Log into your account.
steps.content: Log into your account. Enter your email address, and click Next . Enter your current password, and then click Next . You may be asked to verify your account with a linked email or phone number for security purposes. Click Send code to (linked email/phone) . Check the email's inbox or phone, and input the code to proceed. You'll be taken to the Change your password page.

steps.title: Enter your current password.
steps.content: Enter your current password. Use the first field to enter the password you currently use to sign in.

steps.title: Enter a new password.
steps.content: Enter a new password. Input the new password in the New password and Reenter password fields. Be sure to create a secure password that you can remember . If you're seeing an error, make sure the password is at least 8 characters and they match in both fields. Optional: check the box for Make me change my password every 72 days to help protect your email and security.

steps.title: Click Save.
steps.content: Click Save . This is the blue button. Your password will be changed.
